last_episode_to_air.name: Wedding Bells and Bytes
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Turtles and Master Splinter get ready for April and Casey's wedding.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
overview: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles is an American animated television series, mainly set in New York City. It first aired on February 8, 2003 and ended on February 28, 2009. The series marked the revival of the franchise as a Saturday morning cartoon on Fox's Fox Box programming block The TMNT 2003 TV series was produced by 4Kids Entertainment, and Mirage Studios, which each owned half of the rights to the show, and animated by Dong Woo Animation. Reruns ran on Cartoon Network's Miguzi block in 2004. The series migrated to The CW4Kids in its final season after 4Kids's contract with Fox ended. Nickelodeon now owns the rights to this and any future Turtles series.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: The Turtles slowly come into conflict with the Foot Clan. After their lair is destroyed by Baxter Stockman's mousers, they find a new home elsewhere in the sewers and also gain new allies in the form of April O'Neil and Casey Jones. The Turtles foil the plans of the Shredder, Hun, and Stockman on numerous occasions before Shredder offers Leonardo a peace offering in exchange for their service, citing an unknown evil they must face together. Splinter reveals the Shredder and Hun's hand in murdering his master Hamato Yoshi, and the two sides come to blows in a battle that seemingly ends in the Shredder's defeat. However, unknown to the Turtles, the Shredder survives, and after his ninjas savagely ambush and wound Leonardo, destroys April's home and believes them dead, though the Turtles, Splinter, Casey and April survive and depart for Casey's family's farm house in rural New York. After Leonardo's wounds heal and their resolve is restored, the group returns to New York to face the Foot Clan. However, after their triumph against the Shredder, Splinter vanishes, and after following a lead from a mysterious group known as the "Guardians", the Turtles discover the Utroms, an alien race hiding amongst humanity, and are unable to save Splinter from them before being teleported into space.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: The Turtles find themselves teleported to the alien world of D'Hoonibb, where they immediately are caught up in a war between the Triceraton Republic and the Galactic Federation. The Turtles end up on the Triceraton home world, and after saving Honeycutt, are teleported back to Earth by the Utroms. The aliens reveal themselves to be benevolent and reunite the Turtles with Splinter. In the wake of the Shredder's defeat, a gang war erupts over control of his lost territory by the remainder of the Foot Clan, Hun and the Purple Dragons, and the New York mafia, aided by Baxter Stockman. Shredder is revealed to have survived yet again, and Karai's loyalty to her father conflicting with her honor becomes a critical dilemma for her.

seasons.name: Fast Forward
seasons.overview: Due to the multi-species population of the future, the Turtles are now free to move about openly and interact with everyday people. The season is lighter in tone and less violent than previous ones, with a greater emphasis on jokes.

seasons.name: Back to the Sewer
seasons.overview: The show moved from Fox's 4Kids TV lineup to the CW. The season began with the episode "Tempus Fugit" which aired on September 13, 2008. It is followed by the TV special Turtles Forever.

episodes.name: Things Change
episodes.overview: In their underground lair deep beneath the city streets, the Turtles and Master Splinter are suddenly attacked by a horde of Mouser robots!

episodes.name: A Better Mousetrap
episodes.overview:
The Turtles discover the source of the Mouser robots that trashed their old lair: Dr. Baxter Stockman a noted technological genius/inventor, who tries to pass off the Mousers as a means to eradicate the city's rat problem. Donatello gets one of the broken Mousers working and the Turtles chase it through the sewers.

Meanwhile, Stockman's lab assistant April O'Neil uncovers a secret subterranean facility where hundreds of Mousers are being manufactured and stored - but to what end?

episodes.name: Attack of the Mousers
episodes.overview: When April O'Neil wakes up in the Turtle's lair she has major trouble dealing with the reality of four giant talking Turtles and a Zen-master rat. She soon learns of the origin of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles and they realize their common enemy is Baxter Stockman and his army of robotic Mousers.

episodes.name: Meet Casey Jones
episodes.overview: Raphael is a little cooped up underground with only his brothers and Master Splinter. When Raphael almost clobbers Michelangelo in some brotherly sparring, it's apparent that Raphael needs to get out let off a little steam. But when he meets up with Casey Jones, a vigilante erring a little to the right of justice, Raphael must face the reality of his own hothead ways...

episodes.name: Nano
episodes.overview: When a scientist accidentally unleashes a super-powered Nanotech monster with a childlike mind, it adopts a small-time thief as its father figure, and the mayhem begins! Their crime spree targets April's new antique shop, and the Turtles come to her rescue. But how do you stop something that rebuilds itself as fast as you bash it apart? It's a question the Turtles better answer fast, cause the Nano-matic slices, it dices, and it purees turtle soup in seconds!

episodes.name: Darkness on the Edge of Town
episodes.overview: The Turtles, investigating a strange blackout, discover the Foot Ninja stealing a Japanese ceremonial sword from the Museum. But this is no ordinary sword. And just what do the Foot intend to do with it?

episodes.name: The Way of Invisibility
episodes.overview: After Casey Jones makes himself an unwanted guest in the Turtles' lair, Raphael takes him topside for a "breath of fresh air," where they encounter the Foot Tech Ninjas - enhanced soldiers able to turn themselves invisible. Raph is caught and interrogated, but Casey manages to slip away and warn the others. Raph escapes his captors but, unbeknownst to him, is tailed by a squad of cloaked Foot Tech Ninjas. Will Casey and the others get to Raph in time before he leads the Foot directly to the Turtles' lair?

episodes.name: Fallen Angel
episodes.overview: On a nightly training run, the Turtles and Casey Jones break up a Purple Dragon robbery. One of the perps is Angel, a girl Casey knows from the neighborhood who's going through her initiation rites to become a Purple Dragon. Casey tries to stop Angel from going down the wrong path, but ends up getting captured by the Purple Dragons and offered up as the "prize" in the gang's fight club competitions. It's up to Angel to bring the Turtles in to help rescue Casey. The Turtles must battle it out against the biggest, meanest Dragons, including Hun, their man-mountain of a leader.

episodes.name: Garbageman
episodes.overview: The boys have made friends with a group of homeless, and are worried when they start mysteriously disappearing into the night! Some Turtle-style detective work leads them to the Garbageman, an immense, smelly egomaniac, who is kidnapping the homeless for slave labor to build an empire on a foundation of garbage. Sounds like it's time for the Turtles to take out the trash!

episodes.name: The Shredder Strikes (1)
episodes.overview: Shredder attempts to convince Leonardo that the Foot are fighting the good fight and the turtles should stand with him. Leonardo is taken in and almost convinces the others until Splinter reveals what he knows of the Shredder. Leonardo realizes he's been fooled - it's never a good idea to fool a turtle at least not a Teenage Mutant Ninja one...

episodes.name: The Shredder Strikes (2)
episodes.overview: Our four turtles stand facing their most formidable foe to date - the Shredder. Battle weary, the turtles cannot stand against the Shredder and manage to slip away getting separated in the process. Can they survive apart? Can they get back together in time to save themselves and face the Shredder? Maybe with Master Splinter there to guide them...

episodes.name: The Unconvincing Turtle Titan
episodes.overview: Believing the Turtles can accomplish so much more for the city, and inspired by iconic superhero Silver Sentry, Michelangelo decides to take a crack at being a superhero. But he soon discovers superhero-ism is not all it's cracked up to be. Worse still, he stumbles upon a mind-control experiment by Silver Sentry's arch nemesis Dr Malignus!

episodes.name: Notes from the Underground (1)
episodes.overview: When Don's examination of some mysterious crystals attracts the attention of a subterranean monster, the Turtles underground exploration unearths a Foot Genetics Lab! A video record of strange experiments reveals more of Shredder's mysterious agenda, but when the mutants attack, the boys better watch out, or it's everybody out of the gene pool!

episodes.name: Notes from the Underground (2)
episodes.overview: After discovering an abandoned underground Foot Genetics Lab, and being attacked by the once-human  Quarry, the Turtles assist them in trying to repair a force field to protect them against the mindless beasts roaming the tunnels. But the force field needs a new crystal power source, and the only place to get one is by travelling deeper underground, to the seemingly haunted catacombs, where many have mysteriously vanished...

episodes.name: Notes from the Underground (3)
episodes.overview: When the Turtles and their new allies start vanishing one by one, only Michelangelo is left. He finally finds the perpetrator in the underground city - it's sole survivor. Though his intentions appears noble at first, by restoring the creatures to their normal human selves, there is a catch...

episodes.name: The King
episodes.overview: With all the turtles living in April's apartment, things are getting a little crazy. Donatello meets up with Kirby, an artist renting April's basement apartment. Through the powers of a mysterious crystal tied to his pencil, Kirby is able to create anything he draws including his own world - a world that he and Donatello get sucked into where things get more and more curious.

episodes.name: The Shredder Strikes Back (1)
episodes.overview: On a training run Leo is ambushed by a major Foot attack force, including Foot Tech Ninjas, Hun, and a new threat: the Foot Elite! At their temporary home at April's apartment, Don, Raph and Mikey tire of wait for Leo to get back and decide to go look for him. But is it too late?

episodes.name: The Shredder Strikes Back (2)
episodes.overview: When the Foot Ninja attack April's apartment in force, the Turtles fight against overwhelming odds to get the wounded Leo to safety. The Shredder raises the stakes, trapping our heroes in the burning Antique Shop with no way out!

episodes.name: Tales of Leo
episodes.overview: The Turtles, Splinter, Casey and April just barely manage to escape from the explosion that destroys the antique store. They hit the road and hide out at Casey's grandmother's old farmhouse, but Leonardo is badly wounded, drifting in an out of consciousness. As he attempts to recover, the Turtles and Splinter tell tales of Leonardo's early adventures, using the stories to help guide him back to the real world.

episodes.name: The Monster Hunter
episodes.overview: Still recuperating up at Casey's grandmother's farm, the turtles are feeling the sting of boredom. However, a scientist known as the "Monster Hunter" has come to the area searching for a legendary monster, rekindled by the sighting of a green monster lurking in the woods. So Casey, Mike and Don decide to have a little fun with the Monster Hunter. It all becomes a bit odd when the boys find some other large green creature besides themselves lurking about. Can they survive both monster and Monster Hunter?

episodes.name: Return to New York (1)
episodes.overview: With Leo fully recovered the goal is clear: to destroy the Shredder once and for all. With April providing remote computer assistance, the Turtles begin their assault on the Foot HQ skyscraper, fighting their way to the top floor by floor. They battle an army of Foot Ninja Guards and the deadly cloaking Foot Tech Ninja. But no one is quite prepared for what they encounter inside a Foot Genetics lab...

episodes.name: Return to New York (2)
episodes.overview: The Turtles and Splinter continue to fight their way up through the Foot Headquarters skyscraper to face the Shredder. But they now have to face off against some Shredder Clones, the Foot Tech Ninja and the powerful Foot Mystics! As if that wasn't bad enough, Baxter Stockman decides now is the time to make his move...

episodes.name: Return to New York (3)
episodes.overview: With Stockman showing up in the middle of the final battle, our heroes must temporarily join forces with the Shredder to defeat his exo-suit before he annihilates them all. With everything working against them, high atop the Shredder's skyscraper, can our turtles emerge victorious?! And what roll does the Sword of Tengu have to play?

episodes.name: Lone Raph and Cub
episodes.overview: With Splinter mysteriously vanished, the Turtles are feeling frustrated, not knowing where to start looking. Impatient with strategizing, Raph heads off on his own - and straight into trouble, of the mobster kind!

episodes.name: Search for Splinter (1)
episodes.overview: As the Turtles continue their search for Splinter, they turn their attention to the Guardians. The trail soon leads them to a building marked as "TCRI" - the same letters on the canister of ooze responsible for their mutation! Now with two reasons to infiltrate that building, the Turtles recruit both April and Casey to help get them inside.

episodes.name: Search for Splinter (2)
episodes.overview: The Turtles successfully infiltrate the mysterious TCRI building, and locate the unconscious Splinter inside a stasis tank. But they also discover that there's more to the technicians inside then meets the eye...

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: The Turtles slowly come into conflict with the Foot Clan. After their lair is destroyed by Baxter Stockman's mousers, they find a new home elsewhere in the sewers and also gain new allies in the form of April O'Neil and Casey Jones. The Turtles foil the plans of the Shredder, Hun, and Stockman on numerous occasions before Shredder offers Leonardo a peace offering in exchange for their service, citing an unknown evil they must face together. Splinter reveals the Shredder and Hun's hand in murdering his master Hamato Yoshi, and the two sides come to blows in a battle that seemingly ends in the Shredder's defeat. However, unknown to the Turtles, the Shredder survives, and after his ninjas savagely ambush and wound Leonardo, destroys April's home and believes them dead, though the Turtles, Splinter, Casey and April survive and depart for Casey's family's farm house in rural New York. After Leonardo's wounds heal and their resolve is restored, the group returns to New York to face the Foot Clan. However, after their triumph against the Shredder, Splinter vanishes, and after following a lead from a mysterious group known as the "Guardians", the Turtles discover the Utroms, an alien race hiding amongst humanity, and are unable to save Splinter from them before being teleported into space.

episodes.name: Turtles in Space (1): The Fugitoid
episodes.overview:
The Turtles are taken across space to the Planet D'Hoonnib - and right into the middle of a Police arrest!

They befriend Professor Honeycutt, alias The Fugitoid, who is being pursued by the military forces of General Blanque. The General wants Honeycutt's teleportation device, perhaps the only way The Turtles will reach Earth again...

episodes.name: Turtles in Space (2): The Trouble with Triceratons
episodes.overview: Still trapped on D'Hoonnib, the Turtles and The Fugitoid visit a seedy night club in an effort to find transportation off of the Planet. But General Blanque intercepts them, and, in the battle that follows, Fugitoid is captured by another party interested in the teleportation device...

episodes.name: Turtles in Space (3): The Big House
episodes.overview: Captured by the Triceratons, the Turtles are used to persuade the Fugitoid to work on his teleportation device. Trapped in a jail cell, the Turtles plot an escape plan. But will it work? And can they get to Fugitoid in time?

episodes.name: Turtles in Space (4): The Arena
episodes.overview: The Turtles are brought to the Tri-Sports Arena, where they have been selected to battle as Gladiators. For the Triceraton crowds, the only way to gain victory is by showing no mercy...

episodes.name: Turtles in Space (5): Triceraton Wars
episodes.overview: The Triceratons do battle with the General Blanque's forces and in the chaos, allow the Turtles to capture the Triceraton Prime Leader as their hostage. They prepare to return home using the Fugitoid's teleporter, but there's only one problem : he's never tested it

episodes.name: Secret Origins (1)
episodes.overview: The Turtles arrive inside TCRI, and are reunited with Splinter. They also find themselves facing old ghosts  as well as their origins are revealed to them at last...

episodes.name: Secret Origins (2)
episodes.overview: The Turtles and Splinter use Virtual Reality technology to learn of the Utrom's presence and purpose on Earth, but an old enemy believed dead returns to make the journey VERY real...

episodes.name: Secret Origins (3)
episodes.overview: The Turtles and Splinter escape the Utrom's virtual reality device, but now they must escape TCRI before it is destroyed. Buttheir only way out is hampered by one small obstacle: SHREDDER AND THE FOOT!

episodes.name: The Ultimate Ninja
episodes.overview: The Ultimate Ninja, a warrior from across the galaxies, has come to take the head of Shredder - only to find Leonardo has already done the deed. So now The Ultimate Ninja challenges Leonardo in a battle to the death...

episodes.name: Reflections
episodes.overview: The Turtles retreat to Casey Jone's Grandmother's farm house to reflect on their recent battles. But the figure of the Shredder still haunts their every memory. What is the Shredder's connection to the Turtles origins?

episodes.name: Modern Love - The Return of Nano
episodes.overview: When Nano returns to take revenge on the Turtles, the four brothers must stop his rampage. But this is made more difficult when Nano springs his "Father" from prison...

episodes.name: What a Croc
episodes.overview: The Turtles are about to discover that the Mutagen that transformed them, has had an effect on other creatures as well. They must now defend their territory from the rampage of the insidious alligator Leatherhead...

episodes.name: Return to the Underground
episodes.overview: The Turtles return to the underground city but they find the city is now abandoned, it's crystal moon power source missing, and it's human population reduced to monsters. Can an unstable serum created by Donatello restore the humans to normal?

episodes.name: City at War (1)
episodes.overview: The collapse of Shredder's crime empire means the city is open for the most vicious gangs to seize control for themselves. New York is plunged into chaos and anarchy, and only the Turtles can maintain order..or can they?

episodes.name: City at War (2)
episodes.overview: The Turtles are caught in a power struggle for the city : The Foot, the Purple Dragons, and the Mob, all want a piece of the pie. Are the boys able to save the city from anarchy? And is it their problem in the first place?

episodes.name: City at War (3)
episodes.overview: With the Foot, the Purple Dragons, and the Mob becoming more than the Turtles can handle, the TMNT reluctantly call on the help of Shredder's old General: Karai.

episodes.name: Junklantis
episodes.overview: Whilst testing out their new Shell Sub, the Turtles are forced to sink or swim when they discover their old enemy Garbageman is creating his own underwater city.

episodes.name: The Golden Puck
episodes.overview: Casey Jones joins the sport of Super Slam Hockey. However it turns personal when a legendary 17th century Golden Puck is taken by crooks. Can the Turtles hold Casey in line long enough to find the Puck, or will the hardcore rules of Super Slam Hockey get to them first?

episodes.name: Rogue in the House (1)
episodes.overview: Shredder deploys an army of Foot Mechs and a Cyborg duplicate of Splinter against the Turtles.

episodes.name: Rogue in the House (2)
episodes.overview: Shredder's army of Foot Mechs confront the Turtles, but even if they defeat this army, can they stop Shredder? And how does a Triceraton warrior called Zog fit into it all?

episodes.name: April's Artifact
episodes.overview: The Turtles help April unlock the secrets of an ancient Puzzle cube left behind by her father. The puzzle's solution takes April and the Turtles on a journey of discovery..to another dimension filled with giant insects!

episodes.name: Return of the Justice Force
episodes.overview: Michelangelo's quest to collect a rare comic take the TMNT and Casey Jones back to Northampton, Massachusetts. Here they uncover a plot by a madman to kidnap the members of a retired super-hero team called The Justice Force.

episodes.name: Big Brawl (1)
episodes.overview: Every three years, Splinter leaves his students to go to parts unknown. Curious, the four Turtles decide to follow him this time. The pursuit of their master leads the Turtles into something they never expected, right into the middle of the "Big Brawl" : The Battle for the Nexus, a brutal tournament where fates will be decided...

episodes.name: Big Brawl (2)
episodes.overview: The Turtles discover more about their master Splinter as the Battle Nexus tournament continues. They also have a run-in with a warrior who Splinter defeated in the tournament three years ago: Lord Draco.

episodes.name: Big Brawl (3)
episodes.overview: The Battle Nexus tournament begins to take it's toll on the TMNT : Leonardo is poisoned, Splinter is framed, and Lord Draco moves closer to victory.

episodes.name: Big Brawl (4)
episodes.overview: The Battle Nexus Tournament nears it's conclusion : Dontello finds himself fighting for his life with Usagi Yujumbo as Mikey is poised to become Battle Nexus Champion. Leonardo's condition worsens, and Splinter is still in prison. Worse still, Lord Draco now has control of the Daimyo Warstaff...

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: The Turtles find themselves teleported to the alien world of D'Hoonibb, where they immediately are caught up in a war between the Triceraton Republic and the Galactic Federation. The Turtles end up on the Triceraton home world, and after saving Honeycutt, are teleported back to Earth by the Utroms. The aliens reveal themselves to be benevolent and reunite the Turtles with Splinter. In the wake of the Shredder's defeat, a gang war erupts over control of his lost territory by the remainder of the Foot Clan, Hun and the Purple Dragons, and the New York mafia, aided by Baxter Stockman. Shredder is revealed to have survived yet again, and Karai's loyalty to her father conflicting with her honor becomes a critical dilemma for her.

episodes.name: Space Invaders (1)
episodes.overview: The Triceratons have invaded looking for the Fugitoid. Unfortunately, no one on Earth knows what the heck the big horn heads are talking about.

episodes.name: Space Invaders (2)
episodes.overview: Having managed to rescue Casey and April from becoming slaves, the turtles have lost Donatello to the Triceratons. Donatello tries desperately to convince Prime Leader Zanramon that the Fugitoid is not on Earth!

episodes.name: Space Invaders (3)
episodes.overview: Searching for the captive Donatello, Leonardo, Raphael and Michelangelo sneak their way into Republic Central, the hub of the Triceraton Homeworld.

episodes.name: Worlds Collide (1)
episodes.overview: Just when the turtles think everything's under control with the Triceratons leaving fully convinced the Fugitoid is not on planet Earth, the Fugitoid shows up!

episodes.name: Worlds Collide (2)
episodes.overview: Just when our four turtles thought they had fooled the Triceratons and disguised the Fugitoid, they find themselves captives of the Military.

episodes.name: Worlds Collide (3)
episodes.overview: At the secret Federation/military base, the turtles are about to be dissected by Agent Bishop, a very bad resident of planet Earth. Luckily, our odd trio of commandos (Splinter, April and Casey) are moving in for the rescue.

episodes.name: Touch and Go
episodes.overview: Welcome to the New World...same as the Old World. While the Turtles attempt to assess the damage around their lair, they find that adjusting to their post alien invasion lives might be harder than they thought.

episodes.name: Hunted
episodes.overview: For a two ton reptile, Leatherhead actually makes the ideal houseguest; neat, tidy, always pays his rent on time... except for the fact that his temper is really out of control.

episodes.name: H.A.T.E
episodes.overview: Donatello, Michelangelo and Raphael come across a band of crazed, heavily armed, alien-hating Survivalists, bent upon delivering and detonating a thermo nuclear device in New York City.

episodes.name: Nobody's Fool
episodes.overview: When Michelangelo and Leonardo are out getting a little night air, they cross paths with a caped crusader who ends up saving their lives. The Turtles soon learn that he's really a cop who is out to get the one man who ruined his career.

episodes.name: The Lesson
episodes.overview: April asks the Turtles to help perfect her ninjitsu skills. But the Turtles are reluctant to do so and recount a story about how they once tried to take a "student" under their wing. They just weren't prepared to be teachers.

episodes.name: The Christmas Aliens
episodes.overview: Christmas is supposed to be a time of giving, not taking! But when a dangerous gang of thieves hijack a truck full of holiday toys on it's way to an orphanage, it's time for Michelanglo to start passing out some season's beatings!

episodes.name: New Blood
episodes.overview: The "savior" of New York City, Oroku Saki, has another face: the Shredder. The turtles stumble upon the Shredder's real reason for "helping" New York.

episodes.name: The Darkness Within
episodes.overview: When Angel's brother disappears in the Wall Street area, the turtles jump to help her. Turns out that, as a result of all the destruction from the invasion, an ancient horror has been stirred.

episodes.name: Mission of Gravity
episodes.overview: The Shredder sends Stockman and Hun on a quest to retrieve an Antigravity Generator from the city of Beijing, which is still floating in the upper atmosphere, thanks to the Triceratons.

episodes.name: The Entity Below
episodes.overview: The Entity and his kind are awakened through a rare planetary alignment, and, harnessing great power, they proceed to start shifting the tectonic plates in order to bring back their world.

episodes.name: Time Travails
episodes.overview: The turtles get sucked into a time traveling adventure by the somewhat vapid but totally cute Renet, Apprentice Timestress.

episodes.name: Hun on the Run
episodes.overview: Hun's always been loyal, but too many failures have tarnished his relationship with his master. But when Karai is captured by Bishop, the Shredder gives Hun a mission in which he can redeem himself: save Karai and bring her back alive.

episodes.name: Reality Check
episodes.overview: Ultimate Drako is back and he's causing all sorts of chaos with the Time Scepter. He's sent the four turtles spinning through time into alternate realities.

episodes.name: Across The Universe
episodes.overview: Because of Ultimate Drako's machinations, Raphael finds himself in an alternate reality... of the Planet Racers. This is right down Raphael's alley... until that alley turns into a dead end and he's heading right for it!

episodes.name: Same As It Never Was
episodes.overview: Ultimate Drako's time manipulations have sent Donatello to an alternate reality... and it's not pretty. It's one possible future, a horrible nightmare. The Shredder is all powerful.

episodes.name: The Real World (1)
episodes.overview: Ultimate Drako is causing trouble with the Time Scepter. He blasts Leonardo into another dimension... Usagi Yojimbo's dimension.

episodes.name: The Real World (2)
episodes.overview: Leonardo and Usagi arrive in the Battle Nexus hoping for a way to reunite the four turtles and their master. But they find the Battle Nexus under the control of the evil Ultimate Drako and Master Splinter is his prisoner.

episodes.name: Bishop's Gambit
episodes.overview: Bishop is back and making his move. His research demands a mutated specimen closer to human... a rat: Master Splinter. Bishop kidnaps Splinter and moves to finish the creation of his genetically enhanced super soldiers.

episodes.name: Exodus (1)
episodes.overview: Splinter receives a vision of his Master Yoshi...and a mission. He must stop the Shredder. Time is running out. He doesn't know how to explain it to his sons, but they need no explanation. They're with their father to the bitter end.

episodes.name: Exodus (2)
episodes.overview: The Shredder is leaving Earth in a spaceship of his own construction intent upon wreaking havoc on the Utroms and the galaxy. But he's taken on some unwanted passengers and they're not about to let the Shredder get away.

episodes.name: Cousin Sid
episodes.overview: The Turtles hide out at Casey's farm to recover from their battle with the Shredder. However the ghosts of Casey's past come back to haunt him when his cousin Sid arrives with a gang in tow...

episodes.name: The Peoples' Choice
episodes.overview: The Turtles bear witness to a rumble in the urban jungle between two alien princesses, fighting for the right to party and rule. Pistols at twenty paces. Tally ho.

episodes.name: A Wing And A Prayer
episodes.overview: Ascending to new heights, the Turtles aid the winged warrior named Raptarr against the renegade Mephos to save the floating city of the Avians.

episodes.name: Sons Of The Silent Age
episodes.overview: The Turtles face a species of the deep, and when April gets too close to the action, she grasps a truth behind the current of environmental consequence.

episodes.name: Dragons' Brew
episodes.overview: Casey and Leo investigate a series of large-scale robberies. Not surprisingly, Hun and the Purple Dragon are to blame. However one of their hauls is a crate that should never have been opened!

episodes.name: I, Monster
episodes.overview: Casey and the Turtles are practising their hide-and-seek skills at an abandoned warehouse complex. All the while, a strangely familiar figure watches them from the shadows - with an army of rats at his command!

episodes.name: Grudge Match
episodes.overview: A return to the Battle Nexus, a time to fight, is Mikey bound for glory once more?

episodes.name: All Hallows Theives
episodes.overview: On Halloween night, a mustachioed man visits April, expressing interest in a rather unusual item: a hideous six-armed idol. But the statue is no ordinary junkshop knickknack; it can be used to invoke a horde of imps that proceed to clean out the city and bring its spoils to their master, a criminal who calls himself The King of Thieves.

episodes.name: Bad Day
episodes.overview: The Turtles learn first hand what it means to have a "Bad Shell Day" as calamity after calamity befalls them. This time the Turtles may not be able to save everybody...

episodes.name: Aliens Among Us
episodes.overview: When the President of the United States arrives in New York City, an invasion of what seems to be aliens attacks at the most inconvenient time. However, the Turtles investigate this "invasion" and find out that  Bishop is behind it. The question is - why?

episodes.name: Dragons Rising
episodes.overview: The Purple Dragons have evolved from a basic street gang to a smuggling syndicate that works throughout New York. Leonardo goes with Casey to put an end to Hun's plans. However, Casey and the recently angry Leo will have to control their own fury if they want to bring justice-- and not just veangeance-- out of this.

episodes.name: Still Nobody
episodes.overview: The Turtles help Nobody protect an old man when he witnesses Jengo, leader of the Turks, harming a Turks member. Can the Turtles and Nobody stop the Turks?

episodes.name: Samurai Tourist
episodes.overview: Usagi and Gen come to New York for a visit with the Turtles. Gen gets a little carried away by the bright lights of the big city and goes wandering off on his own. And if the modern world wasn't dangerous enough, an assassin from Usagi's world has followed Usagi and Gen. His target: Leonardo.

episodes.name: The Ancient One
episodes.overview: It is time for Leonardo to move on. Splinter sends Leo to a new sensei, or rather, a very old sensei. The journey is long and perilous. Can Leonardo look into himself and find the right answers to his questions? Can he even find the right questions?

episodes.name: Scion Of The Shredder
episodes.overview: While Leonardo is in Japan studying with the Ancient One, Karai as the new Shredder makes her attack. Will Leo return to New York? Will he find out what happened to his home and his family? And, have Splinter and Turtles really been destroyed?

episodes.name: Prodigal Son
episodes.overview: Leonardo returns from Japan to find the lair in ruins and his family nowhere to be seen. As he investigates he finds that the Foot is back to full strength - with Karai as their leader. Since the Foot believe Leo to be dead, he puts all that he has learnt from the Anicent One into practice...

episodes.name: Outbreak
episodes.overview: Bishop has too deal with the consequenses of his actions when people and animals all over New York starts mutating into horrible beasts after his "alien" invasion.

episodes.name: The Trouble With Augie
episodes.overview: For several years April's uncle Augustus (aka Augie) has been missing.

episodes.name: A Tale Of Master Yoshi
episodes.overview: When the power goes out in their lair, the Turtles and Splinter gather around the candlelight as Leonardo tells a story he learned from the Ancient One about Splinter's sensei, Hamato Yoshi.

episodes.name: The Return Of Savanti (1)
episodes.overview: Savanti Romero plots his revenge against the Turtles and Renet after they had him banished to the Cretaceous period. Using his magic to manipulate time, Romero lures the Turtles and Renet into a trap to obtain the time sceptre.

episodes.name: The Return Of Savanti (2)
episodes.overview: Having travelled to the past, the Turtles and Renet battle with Savanti Romero and his telepathically controlled dinosaurs as Savanti attempts to change the historic timeline by preventing the dinosaur extinction event.

episodes.name: Adventures In Turtlesitting
episodes.overview: With the outbreak-mutant situation the Turtles feel they have to deal with and Donatello sick his brothers leave him with Casey and April for care. But Donatello is not sick but in the last stages of a second mutation.

episodes.name: Good Genes (1)
episodes.overview: With Donatello sick the Turtles are desperate. So desperate that they decide  to try and sneak into Bishops facility, where they realize they have to make a deal with the devil if they want to cure Donatello

episodes.name: Good Genes (2)
episodes.overview: To cure Donatello the Turtles made a deal with the devil aka Bishop. Now they have to retrive a pendant that is supposed to help Bishop in his research. The thing is that the pendant is in the heart of the Foot-building, and Karai won't just hand it over

episodes.name: The Ninja Tribunal
episodes.overview: After the Turtles were able to cure Donatello's mutation, a group of ninjas confronts the Turtles to tell them about a battle between good and evil that will decide the fate of the world.

episodes.name: Lap Of The Gods
episodes.overview: The Ninja Tribunal has called on eight acolytes to stop the coming evil. But first they have to train and be taught some important lessons that may mean the difference between life and death.

episodes.name: Demons and Dragons
episodes.overview: The Turtles begin training with the mysterious Ninja Tribunal, experimenting with new powers and weapons. After securing the first of the Tribunals Lost Artifacts, our heroes learn to their horror that the great evil they are destined to face is the long-imprisoned spirit of the one, true Shredder!

episodes.name: Legend Of The 5 Dragons
episodes.overview: The Turtles train with the Ninja Tribunal to prevent the resurrection of the Shredder. But when Splinter and the Ancient One express serious doubts about trusting the Tribunal, the Turtles are confused. If they all agree on the goal, why the doubts? To explain the danger to the Turtles, Splinter and the Ancient One reveal the secret history of the Tribunal including the true origin of the Shredder!

episodes.name: More Worlds Than One
episodes.overview: The Turtles and company continue their training under the Ninja Tribunal, learning to fight in the physical as well as mental and spiritual worlds. Theyre going to need that knowledge, because the second artefact of the Shredder has been found, guarded by a horde of nasty Tengu demons that eat Acolytes for breakfast literally!

episodes.name: Beginning Of The End
episodes.overview: Returning to the Tribunal Monastery with the second Shredder Artefact, things seem to be going well for our heroes when  deception! Old foes infiltrate the Monastery. With all three artefacts in the hands of evil, they plan a sneak attack on the Tribunal and their students with devastating results!

episodes.name: Membership Drive
episodes.overview: The Justice Force is expanding its ranks, and Mikey plans on joining up as Turtle Titan!, while Leo is more concerned in alerting them to the threat of the original Shredder. But when Nano reappears (thanks to Bishop and Baxter Stockman), everything quickly spirals out of control into a super hero vs. nanotech slugfest! But has Nano come back as friend or foe? And will the Turtle Titan and Leo survive long enough to find out?

episodes.name: New World Order (1)
episodes.overview: The original Shredder is resurrected by the Foot Mystics, whose first agenda is to destroy Karai  the false Shredder. And, while the Turtles are enemies of both Shredders, they realize that if the original Shredder wins, his goal of creating a world of destruction, devastation and chaos will be one huge step closer to reality. So, like it or not, they have to help Karai  even while shes intent on killing them!

episodes.name: New World Order (2)
episodes.overview: In their attempt to rescue Karai from the Foot Mystics and new Shredder, the Turtles wind up in a raging battle filled with magic and martial arts where they use everything the Tribunal taught them - but will it be enough to escape with Karai and their lives?

episodes.name: Fathers & Sons
episodes.overview: Weary after their first battle with the new Shredder, the Turtles doubt they can defeat him. To lift their spirits, Splinter and the Ancient One shares a tale of the Turtles toddler days. The story reveals that though the Turtles were small, they overcame impossible odds to defeat a phantom bent on reviving the Shredder, though they may not remember it.

episodes.name: Past and Present
episodes.overview: Shredder begins to build a new dynasty in New York, transforming the whole island into a hellish nightmare.

episodes.name: Enter the Dragons (1)
episodes.overview: The demonic Shredder has transformed New York City into a nightmare version of Feudal Japan and the rest of the modern world is next! But the Turtles have a plan, and if it takes allying themselves with some of their former enemies to bring the fight to the Shredder, so be it... because if they fail, all life as they known it will cease to exist.

episodes.name: Enter the Dragons (2)
episodes.overview: With the help of their closest allies and most dangerous enemies alike, the Turtles have fought their way through a demonic version of New York to confront the Shredder once and for all! Now the Turtles must have everything they've got and have no choice but to focus their energy and become their very own mystic avatars...Dragons. This night, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles will meet their destinies: Whether to live or die!

episodes.name: Future Shellshock
episodes.overview: With the help of Cody Jones, the future great-grandson of Casey Jones and April O'Neil, our heroes are transported 99 years into the future, where they do battle with all new enemies.

episodes.name: Obsolete
episodes.overview: The Turtles need parts to rebuild the time machine that brought them to the future. However Cody's shady uncle and caretaker Darrius Dun has other plans...

episodes.name: Home Invasion
episodes.overview: An energy based entity known as Viral escapes from her prison and seeks the technological secrets held at O'Neill Tech. There's just one thing she didn't count on : The TMNT!

episodes.name: Headlock Prime
episodes.overview: Leo and Raph decide to go to and see a wrestling match, but when a banned contestant - Triple Threat - crashes the tournament, Raphael decide to stop the wrestler before he goes too far.

episodes.name: Playtime's Over
episodes.overview: Mike has been playing his new favourite video game for three days straight. And when the sequel is announced, he is anything but calm. However Jammerhead and his thugs have their own plans for the impending release...

episodes.name: Bishop to Knight
episodes.overview: The Turtles are shocked to find out one of their old foes from the past is still alive and well in the year 2105. Bishop has become a top agent in Earth's government, and even though he isn't after the Turtles, they don't trust him. But Bishop offers the Turtles an ultimatum if they wish to stop crime...

episodes.name: Night of Sh'okanabo!
episodes.overview: After Mikey finds out Cody has never seen a horror-movie he decides to take him and his brothers to a horror-festival, only to come face to face with a real monster of horror - Sh'okanabo!

episodes.name: Clash Of The Turtle Titans
episodes.overview: Mike finds that in 2105 someone else has taken on the mantle of Turtle Titan. Furious, he tracks down and challenges the 'imposter'. However when Triple Threat shows up and begins to create havoc, the two costumed heroes must put aside their differences...

episodes.name: Fly Me To The Moon
episodes.overview: In an effort to fix the time-window Cody and The Turtles go to the moon to retrieve a special alloy, but are interrupted by The Inuwashi Gunjin - who under Darrius' instructions - are to leave none of them alive!

episodes.name: The Freaks Come Out At Night
episodes.overview: After an outing downtown, Mikey starts behaving strangely  as in super strength, green-slime-spewing strangely. The reason, the Turtles soon discover, is that Mikey has been implanted by one of ShOkanabos gene-seeds.

episodes.name: Bad Blood
episodes.overview: Darius Dun and Sh'Okanabo decide to join forces to get rid of the Turtles. Sh'Okanabo's new creations pose a huge threat  - Enter the Dark Turtles!

episodes.name: The Journal
episodes.overview: While in Cody's trophy-room the Turtles find an old journal written by April and Casey. Feeling homesick they decide to read some of its content...big mistake.

episodes.name: The Gaminator
episodes.overview: In a effort to prove to Sh'Okanabo that she might still be useful to him, Viral sets a trap that digitises and sucks the Turtles into a prototype game system, the Gaminator.

episodes.name: Graduation Day - Class of 2105.
episodes.overview: Splinter announces that the Turtles will graduate to the next ninja rank, Chunin, for using the 3 pillars of life: being invisible, indestructible and showing insight. Except for Michelangelo, who skipped the exam to play video games. But Splinter gives him a last chance to graduate with his brothers.

episodes.name: Timing Is Everything
episodes.overview: Sh'Okanabo unleashes a time storm on New York, putting the Turtles in the middle of chaos, where foes from the past and present collide!

episodes.name: Enter The Jammerhead
episodes.overview: Jammerhead escapes from jail, and with the help of some new technology he has gotten his hands on, is determined to confront the Turtles. At the same time, Starlee's alien family visits Starlee on earth.

episodes.name: Milk Run
episodes.overview: When Torbin Zixx breaks into O'Neil Tech, the Turtles have to chase him through the city and end up on an interstellar trip. But what are his true intentions?

episodes.name: The Fall of Darius Dunn
episodes.overview: Dear old Uncle Darius and his evil pets have returned. Cody tries fighting Darius with his Turtle-X battle armor, but falls to Darius's superior armor. Can Cody turn the tables on his uncle, or is this the end of both him and the Turtles?

episodes.name: Turtle X-Tinction
episodes.overview: Turtle-X is on a rampage and it's not Cody's fault! Someone is controlling Turtle-X remotely but the question is who and why? And more importantly, will the Turtles and Cody live long enough to find out!

episodes.name: Race For Glory
episodes.overview: The Turtles are entering a race as Team O'Neil. Donatello modified the Hovershell to become a top notch racing machine. Also, Triple Threat is destroying everyone's cars in the race. While they are racing, the Turtles meet an ally, Falcon. Can the Turtles survive the road rage?

episodes.name: Head Of State
episodes.overview: An old enemy from the past returns, and he wants Bishop destroyed and only the Turtles can help him. However, when Bishop is kidnapped, the Turtles learn that before he became the Global President and cleaned up his act, he did some "dirty work" for the Earth Protection Force-- poaching and gene splicing aliens. It turns out that in 2055, there was a lab accident that had catastrophic results...

episodes.name: DNA Is Thicker Than Water
episodes.overview: The Dark Turtles are tired of losing and being abused by Darius Dun. With Duns orders to destroy the Turtles looming, Dark Leo comes up with a plan to destroy his opponents from within!

episodes.name: The Cosmic Completist
episodes.overview: A galactic collector who collects rare beings wants the Inuwashi Gunjin in his collection. With nowhere else to go, the Gunjin ask the Turtles for help.

episodes.name: The Day of Awakening
episodes.overview: Torbin Zixx was selling disintegrator weapons to aliens and cheated Big Red out of merchandise. As payback Zixx promises him an experimental matter transmitter he doesn't have - but Boss Zuko does. Meanwhile, a meteor made of dark matter is on a collision course to Earth. Can the turtles get the transmitter from Zuko and stop the meteor? Or will Zixx get there first?

episodes.name: Zixxth Sense
episodes.overview: Sh'Okanabo is finally ready for his last attack. The only obstacles between him and the Day of Awakening are the Turtles... aided by none other than Bishop.

6.name: Fast Forward
6.overview: Due to the multi-species population of the future, the Turtles are now free to move about openly and interact with everyday people. The season is lighter in tone and less violent than previous ones, with a greater emphasis on jokes.

episodes.name: Tempus Fugit
episodes.overview: When the Time Window is finally repaired, the Turtles enter into it to head home, but instead of finding themselves back in the lair, our heroes find themselves with Viral! Shes escaped from inside Serling and has infected the Window so that she can send her most hated enemies on a harrowing, helter-skelter trip through the past, present and future and make them pay for all the pain theyve caused her!

episodes.name: Karate Schooled
episodes.overview: When the Turtles are reunited with Casey and April, it's smiles all around ... until it becomes clear that Casey's being brainwashed by his new martial arts instructor, Master Khan, a devoted Foot operative. The Turtles must save Casey (and themselves) from this deadly Foot fanatic.

episodes.name: Something Wicked
episodes.overview: The Turtles journey into cyberspace as Cybernauts on a mission to save as much of Master Splinter as they can find. But, they find far more than they bargined for as an old foe is re-born in the digital world...

episodes.name: The Engagement Ring
episodes.overview: Casey and Raph head to Chinatown to find an engagement ring for April. They find one, all right. Too bad it has dark, transformational powers. Powers that are of interest to Hun and the Purple Dragons as well.

episodes.name: Hacking Stockman
episodes.overview: While Don focuses on collecting Splinters data bits, his brothers find themselves pulled into a war between The Foot and the Purple Dragons. But things get a lot worse when the cyber-Shredder finds a way out of the digital realm by taking over the powerful robotic body of his old crony, Baxter Stockman! With Splinters data bits just within his grasp, Don is forced to make a terrible choice, help his father or help save his brothers from the Shredder.

episodes.name: The Incredible Shrinking Serling
episodes.overview: Serling, desperate to return to his own time, builds a makeshift Time Window. Unfortunately, he accidentally shrinks himself to five inches tall and goes on a time traveling adventure. Unfortunately, when he escapes the clutches of arguing Turtles, he is found by Wendell, an old man who has been hunting him since Serling destroyed his toy eighty years previously and wants to reproduce him.

episodes.name: Identity Crisis
episodes.overview: Cyber Shredder releases a virus that wipes out the Turtles' memories and brainwashes them into thinking they are his loyal Foot minions.

episodes.name: Web Wranglers
episodes.overview: The Cyber Shredder creates a web portal that he hopes will allow him to venture from cyberspace into the real world. The villain first tests the device by releasing all sorts of mutants and monsters from various online programs. The Turtles must take down the creatures before they tear the city apart and shut down the web portal before Cyber Shredder is able to use it and enter into the real world!

episodes.name: SuperQuest
episodes.overview: The Turtles find more of Splinter's data bits embedded within Mikey's favorite online video game superquest and have to play the game to retrieve them from the treasure.

episodes.name: Virtual Reality Check
episodes.overview: Shredder makes the turtles believe they have left cyberspace, when they are really still there giving him important information about how to build a portal.

episodes.name: City Under Siege
episodes.overview: The Shredder hacks into a computer grid reprograms every electronic device in N.Y.

episodes.name: Super Power Struggle
episodes.overview: When Raph gets hold of a cape that grants him super powers, an impressed Justice Force invites him into their ranks and Mikey gets super jealous. But when Dr. Malignus tries to get the cape for his own villainous designs, Mikey and Raph must put aside their differences to save the city!

episodes.name: Wedding Bells and Bytes
episodes.overview: The Turtles and Master Splinter get ready for April and Casey's wedding.

7.name: Back to the Sewer
7.overview: The show moved from Fox's 4Kids TV lineup to the CW. The season began with the episode "Tempus Fugit" which aired on September 13, 2008. It is followed by the TV special Turtles Forever.
